amendment.description: Amendment reduces the Fish and Wildlife account by $1 million and increases the Army Corps of Engineers Reserve Maintenance Account by $571,429 with the balance of $428,571 being applied to deficit reduction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Army Corps of Engineers Construction Account by $1 million and increase the Army Corps of Engineers Operation and Maintenance Account by $571,429.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 203 - 185 (Roll no. 307).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 203 - 185 (Roll no. 307).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. King (IA).
